turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, can you place an order with Starbucks on First street for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, will you be ordering your usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think I will order the Java Chip today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, Ok, whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to charge your card on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will you be picking this up or do you want me to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will stop by to pick it up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I placed the order. It will be ready at the Starbucks on First street in just about ten minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will place the order to the Starbucks on First street, it is on the way. Oh, do you want me to have them switch up any ingredients?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just a small regular Java Chip will work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have placed the order, I should be there to pick it up shortly

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't think so, just a receipt sent to my phone please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That confirmation and receipt is on its way now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye!
